title: Rescue the Druid Halsin
content:
d examines you, making him aware of your parasite. He asks you about it. You will have the following dialogue options.

I don't know I escaped from an illithid ship after being infected. Maybe the process was interrupted. I think this artefact has something to do with it.

Choosing dialogue 2 will make Halsin realize you were looking for him to cure you, and tells you that he has been studying them. He cannot cure you, but he will try to help. He has found out the origin location of these enchan
